twitter

Class TwitterPost

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialmedia.Post<TwitterUser>
      • twitter.TwitterPost

  • public class TwitterPost
extends Post<TwitterUser>
    Class representing a post in Twitter. Only contains twitter specific variables. Extends socialmedia Post class.
    See Also:
    Post
